address.pinflInfoTitle: Why do we need your PINFL?
address.pinflInfoDescription: To ensure smooth delivery of your order from Turkey to Uzbekistan, we require your PINFL for identity verification and customs clearance. Please provide the correct PINFL to avoid any delays or issues with customs processing.

errorPage.title: Something went wrong
errorPage.body:
We are having trouble loading this page right now.

You can try again or contact us if the error persists.

notFoundPage.title: We couldn't find this page
notFoundPage.body:
We looked really hard, but could not find this page.

This is a 404 error.

accountPage.authRequiredBody: You need to login to access this page.

phoneNumberModal.title: Sign in
phoneNumberModal.body: Enter your phone number to sign in. We will send you an SMS message with a verification code.

Enter the verification code we sent to:
